## Materials

These are the materials for the SURF Research Bootcamp hosted at Hogeschool Utrecht, November 2, 2018

## Linux Dependencies

If you are on an UBUNTU Linux distro
For the demos to work completly you will need the system dependencies:

```
libcairo2-dev
libudunits2-dev
```
